weapons.name: Iron Sword
weapons.desc: The Iron Sword looks like the Wooden Sword but a dark grey color.

weapons.name: Iron Axe
weapons.desc: Like all Axes, an Iron Axe is most useful for cutting trees and other wood objects. But for cutting heads is good aswell!

armor.name: Iron Helmet
armor.desc: Good for protection, but have you tried it as a bowl?

armor.name: Iron Chestplate
armor.desc: Many fashion designers were inspired by this model. Really good with Iron Leggins.

armor.name: Iron Leggins
armor.desc: Not very kind to your washing machine.

armor.name: Iron Boots
armor.desc: Orthopedists use these shoes as a last resort for flat feet.

food.name: Beef Jerky
food.desc: Beef Jerky is created with lean cuts of beef cut into strips and dried to preserve the flavor in a convenient, hand-held snack.
